## Case 1: Command redundant does more than just removing redundant inequalities

```{r}
library(rcdd)

a1 = 
  rbind(c("1" ,"0" , "0" ),
        c("-1" , "0",  "0" ),
        c("1" , "0",  "0" ),
        c("-1","0" , "0" ))

b1 = c( "1/2", "-1/2" , "1"   ,  "0"   )

h_rep = makeH(a1,b1)

h_rep

h_rep_non_redundant = redundant(h_rep)

h_rep_non_redundant$output
```

##  Case 2: Impossible equalities


```{r}

a1 = 
  rbind(c( "1" , "0",  "0"), 
        c("-1", "0",  "0" ),
        c ("1",  "0",  "0" ),
        c ("-1" ,"0" , "0" ))

b1 = c("1/2", "-6/10", "1" ,  "0")

h_rep = makeH(a1,b1)


h_rep

h_rep_non_redundant = redundant(h_rep)

h_rep_non_redundant$output

```
